commands: description               -> Look around and read the room's description.
go <room name>            -> Move to a neighboring room.
examine <item/object>     -> Read details about an item or object.
inventory                 -> Display items you are carrying.
drop <item>               -> Drop an item from your inventory.
equip <item>              -> Put on protective gear (e.g., suit).
interact <item/object>    -> Use machines, panels, or the reactor.
talk <character name>     -> Speak to a person in the current room.
clue                      -> Get a hint on what you need to achieve your goal.
time                      -> Check remaining time and current loop.

clues.reactor:
==================================================
   MISSION OBJECTIVE: REPAIR REACTOR
==================================================
To prevent the destruction of the ship, you must fully repair the main REACTOR.
Explore the ship to find these items and interact with the Reactor to use them:

 - Protective Suit (must be equipped first!)
 - Fire Extinguisher
 - Reactor Card
 - Calibrator
 - Welding Machine

Tip: Talk to the crew and examine toolkits or storage areas.
==================================================
clues.escape:
==================================================
 MISSION OBJECTIVE: ESCAPE SPACESHIP
==================================================
To escape the doomed ship, you must prepare ESCAPE MODULE for launch.
Explore the ship to fulfill these requirements:

 - Interact with the CONTROL PANEL to route power (requires a security code)
 - Fuel
 - Emergency Kit
 - E.M. Card 2

Tip: Pay attention to scattered notes and locked rooms.
==================================================

UI.win_solo:
[ENDING: LONE WOLF]
You launched the escape pod just in time. Through the small window, you see the MI BOMDO TX670 vanish in a silent flash. You are alive, but the guilt of leaving everyone behind follows you into the dark.
UI.win_with_lucy:
[ENDING: SURVIVORS]
You and Lucy secured the last pod together. As the ship explodes, she looks at you with relief. You're not just a survivor; you're a partner. The journey ahead is long, but you're not alone.
UI.win_betrayal:
[ENDING: BLOOD IS THICKER THAN WATER]
You told them about the pod, but blood is thicker than water. The Captain didn't even look you in the eye as he pushed Caroline inside and locked the hatch. You are left standing in the docking bay, watching the pod vanish into the stars while the reactor behind you reaches critical mass.

UI.story:
================================================================================
   YEAR: 2167 | LOCATION: DEEP SPACE | MI BOMDO TX670
================================================================================

You wake up with a splitting headache. The last thing you remember was a 
blinding flash of white light near the Saturn rings. 

Suddenly, the emergency sirens start screaming. Red lights are pulsing 
everywhere. Your terminal shows a critical error: 'REACTOR MELTDOWN IN A FEW MINUTES'.

But something is wrong... You feel like you've lived through this moment 
a thousand times before. Every spark from the cables, every scream in the 
distance feels familiar. You are trapped in a time loop, and the only way 
to break it is to resolve the disaster at hand.
================================================================================

UI.about:
--- ABOUT SATURN EXPEDITION ---
Welcome to Saturn Expedition! This is a console-based sci-fi escape room game.
It features time loop mechanics, challenging puzzles, and multiple endings.

This game is my FIRST proper programming project, created as a student at SPŠE Ječná.
I am still learning, but I put a lot of passion into building this interactive world.
Thank you for playing and I hope you enjoy the escape!
